   20: 
   21: %%
   22: 
   23: -module(ssl_ECC_SUITE).
   24: 
   25: -behaviour(ct_suite).
   26: 
   27: -include("ssl_test_lib.hrl").
   28: -include_lib("ssl/src/ssl_record.hrl").
   29: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   30: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
   31: 
   32: 
   33: %% Common test
   34: -export([all/0,
   35:          groups/0,
   36:          init_per_suite/1,
   37:          init_per_group/2,
   38:          init_per_testcase/2,
   39:          end_per_suite/1,
   40:          end_per_group/2,
   41:          end_per_testcase/2
   42:         ]).
   43: 
   44: %% Test cases
   45: -export([ecc_default_order/1,
   46:          ecc_default_order_custom_curves/1,
   47:          ecc_client_order/1,
   48:          ecc_client_order_custom_curves/1,
   49:          ecc_unknown_curve_ecdhe_ecdsa/1,
   50:          ecc_unknown_curve_ecdhe_rsa/1,
   51:          client_ecdh_rsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_custom/1,
   52:          client_ecdh_rsa_server_ecdhe_rsa_server_custom/1,
   53:          client_ecdhe_rsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_custom/1,
   54:          client_ecdhe_rsa_server_ecdhe_rsa_server_custom/1,
   55:          client_ecdhe_rsa_server_ecdh_rsa_server_custom/1,
   56:          client_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_custom/1,
   57:          client_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_ecdhe_rsa_server_custom/1,
   58:          client_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_client_custom/1,
   59:          client_ecdhe_rsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_client_custom/1,
   60:          client_ecdsa_server_ecdsa_with_raw_key/1,
   61:          mix_sign/1
   62:         ]).
   63: 
   64: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   65: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   66: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   67: 
   68: all() ->
   69:     [
   70:      {group, 'tlsv1.2'},
   71:      {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
   72:      {group, 'tlsv1'},
   73:      {group, 'dtlsv1.2'},
   74:      {group, 'dtlsv1'}
   75:     ].
   76: 
   77: groups() ->
   78:     [
   79:      {'tlsv1.2', [], [mix_sign | test_cases()]},
   80:      {'tlsv1.1', [], test_cases()},
   81:      {'tlsv1', [], test_cases()},
   82:      {'dtlsv1.2', [], [mix_sign | test_cases()]},
   83:      {'dtlsv1', [], test_cases()}
   84:     ].
   85: 
   86: test_cases()->
   87:     misc() ++ ecc_negotiation().
   88: 
   89: misc()->
   90:     [client_ecdsa_server_ecdsa_with_raw_key].
   91: 
   92: ecc_negotiation() ->
   93:     [ecc_default_order,
   94:      ecc_default_order_custom_curves,
   95:      ecc_client_order,
   96:      ecc_client_order_custom_curves,
   97:      ecc_unknown_curve_ecdhe_ecdsa,
   98:      ecc_unknown_curve_ecdhe_rsa,
   99:      client_ecdh_rsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_custom,
  100:      client_ecdh_rsa_server_ecdhe_rsa_server_custom,
  101:      client_ecdhe_rsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_custom,
  102:      client_ecdhe_rsa_server_ecdhe_rsa_server_custom,
  103:      client_ecdhe_rsa_server_ecdh_rsa_server_custom,
  104:      client_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_custom,
  105:      client_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_ecdhe_rsa_server_custom,
  106:      client_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_client_custom,
  107:      client_ecdhe_rsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_client_custom
  108:     ].
  109: 
  110: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  111: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
  112:     end_per_suite(Config0),
  113:     try crypto:start() of
  114: 	ok ->
  115:             case ssl_test_lib:sufficient_crypto_support(cipher_ec) of
  116:                 true ->
  117:                     Config0;
  118:                 false ->
  119:                     {skip, "Crypto does not support ECC"}
  120:             end
  121:     catch _:_ ->
  122:             {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  123:     end.
  124: 
  125: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  126:     application:stop(ssl),
  127:     application:stop(crypto).
  128: 
  129: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  130: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  131:     case ssl_test_lib:is_protocol_version(GroupName) of
  132: 	true ->
  133:             ?CT_LOG("Ciphers: ~p~n ", [ssl:cipher_suites(default, GroupName)]),
  134:             ssl_test_lib:init_per_group(GroupName,
  135:                                         [{client_type, erlang},
  136:                                          {server_type, erlang},
  137:                                          {version, GroupName} | Config]);
  138:         false ->
  139:             Config
  140:     end.
  141: 
  142: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  143:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  144: 
  145: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  146: 
  147: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config) ->
  148:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  149:     end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config),
  150:     ssl:start(),
  151:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 5}),
  152:     Config.
  153: 
  154: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  155:     application:stop(ssl),
  156:     Config.
  157: 
  158: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  159: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  160: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  161: %% Test different certificate chain types, note that it is the servers
  162: %% chain that affect what cipher suite that will be chosen
  163: 
  164: client_ecdsa_server_ecdsa_with_raw_key(Config)  when is_list(Config) ->
  165:      Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  166:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  167:                                                        {client_chain, Default}]
  168:                                                      , ecdhe_ecdsa, ecdhe_ecdsa, Config),
  169:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  170:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  171:     ServerKeyFile = proplists:get_value(keyfile, SOpts),
  172:     {ok, PemBin} = file:read_file(ServerKeyFile),
  173:     PemEntries = public_key:pem_decode(PemBin),
  174:      {'ECPrivateKey', Key, not_encrypted} = proplists:lookup('ECPrivateKey', PemEntries),
  175:     ServerKey = {'ECPrivateKey', Key},
  176:     SType = proplists:get_value(server_type, Config),
  177:     CType = proplists:get_value(client_type, Config),
  178:     {Server, Port} =
  179:         ssl_test_lib:start_server_with_raw_key(SType,
  180:                                                [{key, ServerKey} | proplists:delete(keyfile, SOpts)],
  181:                                                Config),
  182:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client(CType, Port, COpts, Config),
  183:     ssl_test_lib:gen_check_result(Server, SType, Client, CType),
  184:     ssl_test_lib:stop(Server, Client).
  185: 
  186: ecc_default_order(Config) ->
  187:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  188:     DefaultCurve = pubkey_cert_records:namedCurves(hd(tls_v1:ecc_curves(?TLS_1_0))),
  189:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  190:                                                          {client_chain, Default}],
  191:                                                         ecdhe_ecdsa, ecdhe_ecdsa,
  192:                                                         Config, DefaultCurve),
  193:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  194:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  195:     ECCOpts = [],
  196:     case ssl_test_lib:supported_eccs([{eccs, [DefaultCurve]}]) of
  197:         true ->  ssl_test_lib:ecc_test(DefaultCurve, COpts, SOpts, [], ECCOpts, Config);
  198:         false -> {skip, "unsupported named curves"}
  199:      end.
  200: 
  201: ecc_default_order_custom_curves(Config) ->
  202:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  203:     DefaultCurve = pubkey_cert_records:namedCurves(hd(tls_v1:ecc_curves(?TLS_1_0))),
  204:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  205:                                                          {client_chain, Default}],
  206:                                                         ecdhe_ecdsa, ecdhe_ecdsa,
  207:                                                         Config, DefaultCurve),
  208:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  209:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  210:     ECCOpts = [{eccs, [secp256r1, DefaultCurve]}],
  211:     case ssl_test_lib:supported_eccs(ECCOpts) of
  212:          true ->  ssl_test_lib:ecc_test(DefaultCurve, COpts, SOpts, [], ECCOpts, Config);
  213:         false -> {skip, "unsupported named curves"}
  214:     end.
  215: 
  216: ecc_client_order(Config) ->
  217:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  218:     DefaultCurve = pubkey_cert_records:namedCurves(hd(tls_v1:ecc_curves(?TLS_1_0))),
  219:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  220:                                                          {client_chain, Default}],
  221:                                                         ecdhe_ecdsa, ecdhe_ecdsa,
  222:                                                         Config, DefaultCurve),
  223:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  224:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  225:     ECCOpts = [{honor_ecc_order, false}],
  226:     case ssl_test_lib:supported_eccs([{eccs, [DefaultCurve]}]) of
  227:          true -> ssl_test_lib:ecc_test(DefaultCurve, COpts, SOpts, [], ECCOpts, Config);
  228:         false -> {skip, "unsupported named curves"}
  229:     end.
  230: 
  231: ecc_client_order_custom_curves(Config) ->
  232:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  233:     DefaultCurve = pubkey_cert_records:namedCurves(hd(tls_v1:ecc_curves(?TLS_1_0))),
  234:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  235:                                                         {client_chain, Default}],
  236:                                                         ecdhe_ecdsa, ecdhe_ecdsa,
  237:                                                         Config, DefaultCurve),
  238:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  239:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  240:     ECCOpts = [{honor_ecc_order, false}, {eccs, [secp256r1, DefaultCurve]}],
  241:     case ssl_test_lib:supported_eccs(ECCOpts) of
  242:         true -> ssl_test_lib:ecc_test(DefaultCurve, COpts, SOpts, [], ECCOpts, Config);
  243:         false -> {skip, "unsupported named curves"}
  244:     end.
  245: 
  246: ecc_unknown_curve_ecdhe_ecdsa(Config) ->
  247:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  248:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  249:                                                        {client_chain, Default}],
  250:                                                         ecdhe_ecdsa, ecdhe_ecdsa, Config),
  251:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  252:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  253:     ECCALL = ssl:eccs(),
  254:     SECCOpts = [{eccs, [hd(ECCALL)]}],
  255:     CECCOpts = [{eccs, tl(ECCALL)}],
  256:     ssl_test_lib:ecc_test_error(COpts, SOpts, CECCOpts, SECCOpts, Config).
  257: 
  258: ecc_unknown_curve_ecdhe_rsa(Config) ->
  259:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  260:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  261:                                                          {client_chain, Default}],
  262:                                                         ecdhe_rsa, ecdhe_rsa, Config),
  263:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  264:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  265:     ECCALL = ssl:eccs(),
  266:     SECCOpts = [{eccs, [hd(ECCALL)]}],
  267:     CECCOpts = [{eccs, tl(ECCALL)}],
  268:     ssl_test_lib:ecc_test_error(COpts, SOpts, CECCOpts, SECCOpts, Config).
  269: 
  270: client_ecdh_rsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_custom(Config) ->
  271:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  272:     DefaultCurve = pubkey_cert_records:namedCurves(hd(tls_v1:ecc_curves(?TLS_1_0))),
  273:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  274:                                                        {client_chain, Default}],
  275:                                                         ecdh_rsa, ecdhe_ecdsa, Config),
  276:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  277:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  278:     ECCOpts = [{honor_ecc_order, true}, {eccs, [secp256r1, DefaultCurve]}],
  279:      case ssl_test_lib:supported_eccs(ECCOpts) of
  280:          true -> ssl_test_lib:ecc_test(secp256r1, COpts, SOpts, [], ECCOpts, Config);
  281:          false -> {skip, "unsupported named curves"}
  282:      end.
  283: 
  284: client_ecdh_rsa_server_ecdhe_rsa_server_custom(Config) ->
  285:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  286:     DefaultCurve = pubkey_cert_records:namedCurves(hd(tls_v1:ecc_curves(?TLS_1_0))),
  287:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  288:                                                          {client_chain, Default}],
  289:                                                         ecdh_rsa, ecdhe_rsa, Config),
  290:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  291:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  292:     ECCOpts = [{honor_ecc_order, true}, {eccs, [secp256r1, DefaultCurve]}],
  293: 
  294:     case ssl_test_lib:supported_eccs(ECCOpts) of
  295:         true -> ssl_test_lib:ecc_test(secp256r1, COpts, SOpts, [], ECCOpts, Config);
  296:         false -> {skip, "unsupported named curves"}
  297:     end.
  298: 
  299: client_ecdhe_rsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_custom(Config) ->
  300:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  301:     DefaultCurve = pubkey_cert_records:namedCurves(hd(tls_v1:ecc_curves(?TLS_1_0))),
  302:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  303:                                                          {client_chain, Default}],
  304:                                                         ecdhe_rsa, ecdhe_ecdsa, Config),
  305:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  306:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  307:     ECCOpts = [{honor_ecc_order, true}, {eccs, [secp256r1, DefaultCurve]}],
  308:     case ssl_test_lib:supported_eccs(ECCOpts) of
  309:          true -> ssl_test_lib:ecc_test(secp256r1, COpts, SOpts, [], ECCOpts, Config);
  310:         false -> {skip, "unsupported named curves"}
  311:     end.
  312: 
  313: client_ecdhe_rsa_server_ecdhe_rsa_server_custom(Config) ->
  314:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  315:     DefaultCurve = pubkey_cert_records:namedCurves(hd(tls_v1:ecc_curves(?TLS_1_0))),
  316:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  317:                                                          {client_chain, Default}],
  318:                                                         ecdhe_rsa, ecdhe_rsa, Config),
  319: 
  320:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  321:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  322:     ECCOpts = [{honor_ecc_order, true}, {eccs, [secp256r1, DefaultCurve]}],
  323:     case ssl_test_lib:supported_eccs(ECCOpts) of
  324:         true -> ssl_test_lib:ecc_test(secp256r1, COpts, SOpts, [], ECCOpts, Config);
  325:         false -> {skip, "unsupported named curves"}
  326:      end.
  327: client_ecdhe_rsa_server_ecdh_rsa_server_custom(Config) ->
  328:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  329:     DefaultCurve = pubkey_cert_records:namedCurves(hd(tls_v1:ecc_curves(?TLS_1_0))),
  330:     Ext = x509_test:extensions([{key_usage, [keyEncipherment]}]),
  331:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, [[], [], [{extensions, Ext}]]},
  332:                                                          {client_chain, Default}],
  333:                                                         ecdhe_rsa, ecdh_rsa, Config),
  334: 
  335:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  336:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  337:     ECCOpts = [{honor_ecc_order, true}, {eccs, [secp256r1, DefaultCurve]}],
  338:     Expected = secp256r1, %% The certificate curve
  339: 
  340:     case ssl_test_lib:supported_eccs(ECCOpts) of
  341:         true -> ssl_test_lib:ecc_test(Expected, COpts, SOpts, [], ECCOpts, Config);
  342:         false -> {skip, "unsupported named curves"}
  343:     end.
  344: 
  345: client_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_custom(Config) ->
  346:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  347:     DefaultCurve = pubkey_cert_records:namedCurves(hd(tls_v1:ecc_curves(?TLS_1_0))),
  348:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  349:                                                        {client_chain, Default}],
  350:                                                         ecdhe_ecdsa, ecdhe_ecdsa, Config),
  351:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  352:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  353:     ECCOpts = [{honor_ecc_order, true}, {eccs, [secp256r1, DefaultCurve]}],
  354:     case ssl_test_lib:supported_eccs(ECCOpts) of
  355:         true -> ssl_test_lib:ecc_test(secp256r1, COpts, SOpts, [], ECCOpts, Config);
  356:         false -> {skip, "unsupported named curves"}
  357:     end.
  358: 
  359: client_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_ecdhe_rsa_server_custom(Config) ->
  360:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  361:     DefaultCurve = pubkey_cert_records:namedCurves(hd(tls_v1:ecc_curves(?TLS_1_0))),
  362:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  363:                                                          {client_chain, Default}],
  364:                                                         ecdhe_ecdsa, ecdhe_rsa, Config),
  365:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  366:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  367:     ECCOpts = [{honor_ecc_order, true}, {eccs, [secp256r1, DefaultCurve]}],
  368:     case ssl_test_lib:supported_eccs(ECCOpts) of
  369:         true -> ssl_test_lib:ecc_test(secp256r1, COpts, SOpts, [], ECCOpts, Config);
  370:         false -> {skip, "unsupported named curves"}
  371:     end.
  372: 
  373: client_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_client_custom(Config) ->
  374:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  375:     DefaultCurve = pubkey_cert_records:namedCurves(hd(tls_v1:ecc_curves(?TLS_1_0))),
  376:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  377:                                                        {client_chain, Default}],
  378:                                                         ecdhe_ecdsa, ecdhe_ecdsa, Config),
  379:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  380:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  381:     ECCOpts = [{eccs, [secp256r1, DefaultCurve]}],
  382:     case ssl_test_lib:supported_eccs(ECCOpts) of
  383:         true -> ssl_test_lib:ecc_test(secp256r1, COpts, SOpts, ECCOpts, [], Config);
  384:         false -> {skip, "unsupported named curves"}
  385:     end.
  386: 
  387: client_ecdhe_rsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_client_custom(Config) ->
  388:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  389:     DefaultCurve = pubkey_cert_records:namedCurves(hd(tls_v1:ecc_curves(?TLS_1_0))),
  390:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  391:                                                          {client_chain, Default}],
  392:                                                          ecdhe_rsa, ecdhe_ecdsa, Config),
  393:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  394:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  395:     ECCOpts = [{eccs, [secp256r1, DefaultCurve]}],
  396:     case ssl_test_lib:supported_eccs(ECCOpts) of
  397:         true -> ssl_test_lib:ecc_test(secp256r1, COpts, SOpts, ECCOpts, [], Config);
  398:         false -> {skip, "unsupported named curves"}
  399:     end.
  400: 
  401: mix_sign(Config) ->
  402:     mix_sign_rsa_peer(Config),
  403:     mix_sign_ecdsa_peer(Config).
  404: 
  405: mix_sign_ecdsa_peer(Config) ->
  406:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_mix_cert([{mix, peer_ecc} |Config]),
  407:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  408:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  409:     ECDHE_ECDSA =
  410:         ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(default, 'tlsv1.2'),
  411:                                  [{key_exchange, fun(ecdhe_ecdsa) -> true; (_) -> false end}]),
  412:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(COpts, [{ciphers, ECDHE_ECDSA} | SOpts], Config).
  413: 
  414: 
  415: mix_sign_rsa_peer(Config) ->
  416:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_mix_cert([{mix, peer_rsa} |Config]),
  417:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  418:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  419:     ECDHE_RSA =
  420:         ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(default, 'tlsv1.2'),
  421:                                  [{key_exchange, fun(ecdhe_rsa) -> true; (_) -> false end}]),
  422:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(COpts, [{ciphers, ECDHE_RSA} | SOpts], Config).
